homepage.title: Nully File Transfer
homepage.subtitle: Share files directly between devices without any servers. Fast, secure, and completely decentralized.

features.title: Why Choose P2P Transfer?
features.p2pDesc: Direct file transfer between you and your receiver, no middleman
features.noCloudDesc: Your files aren't saved in the cloud, you stay in control of your files
features.unlimitedDesc: No restriction on file extension or size

metadata.title: Nully File Transfer
metadata.description: Peer-to-peer file transfer application - share files directly between devices
